name: Energizer Weatheready Rechargeable Flashlights for Home, Pack of 3, Emergency Flashlight for Hurricane Supplies, Survival Kits, Power Outages, LED Flash Light with Convenient Plug-in Design
short_description: Rechargeable LED Flashlight: Small rechargeable flashlight with plug-in design that fits standard outlets, works as flashlights for emergencies Convenient Plug In Features: The compact handheld flashlights plug into the wall with retractable prongs for convenient use and easy charging, making them great emergency preparedness items Durable Design: This Energizer flashlight is impact resistant up to 1 meter for a durable LED flashlight rechargeable in a standard outlet LED Power Failure Light: Keep this emergency LED light plugged in to turn on automatically during power outages, providing a reliable flashlight when you need it most Emergency Light: Be prepared for power outages at all times with these emergency lights for home, including (3) Energizer Weatheready Rechargeable Compact Handheld Lights Superior LED Technology: The small flashlight's light is up to 4x brighter than standard LED technology and illuminates objects up to 30 meters away
product_description: Energizer Weatheready Rechargeable Compact Handheld Light helps you prepare for power outages with a rechargeable plug-in design. Designed for emergency situations, this rechargeable LED light features a built-in rechargeable battery and plugs into the wall so it's always charged and ready to help keep your family safe. This emergency flashlight is up to 4x brighter than standard LED technology and illuminates objects up to 30 meters away to give you the brightness you need when the lights go out. A retractable AC plug goes directly into any standard electrical outlet and folds out of the way while you use this Energizer flashlight. It charges overnight to provide 3 hours of runtime, and it has a red LED charging indicator that lights up to show you when this flashlight is charging. Leave the switch in the on position while it charges so the compact flashlight turns on automatically when the power goes out, making it easy to find and convert into a handheld flashlight. No batteries to replace, always ready to shine.

name: GearLight S2000 LED Rechargeable Flashlight High Lumens - Super Bright, Powerful, Mid-Size Tactical Flashlight for Outdoor Activity & Emergency Use
short_description: Super Bright & Long-Lasting – Powered by a high-performance LED, the S2000 delivers an ultra-bright beam that reaches up to 1000 feet, lighting up even the darkest environments. Enjoy extended runtimes thanks to the built-in high-capacity rechargeable battery. USB Rechargeable & Convenient – Easily recharge the flashlight with the included USB cable—no need for disposable batteries. The integrated charging port allows for quick and efficient power-ups wherever you are. Rugged & Weather-Resistant – Constructed from military-grade aluminum, the S2000 is both water- and impact-resistant, making it tough enough to handle drops, rain, snow, and rough handling. Adjustable Focus & Multiple Light Modes – Switch between wide floodlight and focused spotlight with the adjustable zoom, and choose from multiple modes like High, Medium, Low, Strobe, and SOS for every scenario. Perfect for Any Situation – Whether you're hiking, camping, working in the dark, or preparing for power outages, the GearLight S2000 Rechargeable Flashlight is your go-to tool for dependable, high-powered illumination.
product_description: GearLight S2000 Rechargeable LED Flashlight – Ultra Bright, Durable, and Ready for Anything Experience powerful lighting performance with the rechargeable GearLight S2000, a high-lumen LED flashlight built for reliability and convenience. Designed for outdoor adventures, emergency preparedness, and everyday use, this upgraded version combines long-lasting brightness with the ease of USB recharging—no need to buy or replace batteries.
